Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Blackheart replied, "Finish your little fight. Send all the pods up to the 
ship and we shall store them here. The Galvatron and Megatron union gives me 
great joy, we can kill two masterminds at once. When they fight is over...I 
shall contact you again." He cut off the comm. "Kaiser sweep the planet and 
search for a suitable place to set down...one with soem type of military 
advantage."

--part1_11.1f2db5c.2b013478_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
